timeline.raw_data: {"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-09-26T13:17:09", "sender_email": "raheehasan1@gmail.com", "recipient_email": "flavia.dsouza@thisisfresh.com", "subject": "Regarding booking cancellation and reimbursement of advance rent (150 GBP)", "message": "Dear authority,\\n\\nI am writing to let you know that due to the confusions regarding the phone conversation about payment of the 1st instalment of my rent, I would like to cancel my booking of a Bronze Premium En Suite (51 Weeks) room at Pavilion Court. Since I am a Commonwealth PhD Scholar and my stipends will start from October 1, 2025, I am unable to pay any instalment before October 1.\\n\\nI am therefore requesting you to reimburse my booking money (advance rent) of 150 GBP. Please let me know if you want any alternative bank account to process the refund.\\n\\nYours sincerely,\\n\\nRahee Hasan Chowdhury", "snippet": "Dear authority, I am writing to let you know that due to the confusions regarding the phone conversation about payment of the 1 st instalment of my rent, I would like to cancel my booking of a Bronze", "sender_type": "student", "agent_email": "flavia.dsouza@thisisfresh.com", "student_email": "raheehasan1@gmail.com"}

transcripts.transcript_text: Speaker A: Hello. Yeah, hello, am I speaking at Rahi here? Hello, am I speaking with Rahi? Yes, yes, I'm ready. Yeah. Calling you from Amsterdam. Sorry. Rahi Dish of this site calling you from Rahi. Rishabh, this site calling you from Ambassador. Student from. From Amber. Students. Yeah, from Amber. The official accommodation partner. Oh yes, yes. University College London. Yes, yes. So I just wanted to update regarding my query. Is it fine if I connect you on WhatsApp? I think that the network is a bit broken. It's not working properly. Yes, yes, please, please. This is my WhatsApp number. Yes, yes, you can connect me by WhatsApp. Yes.
